title: Query regarding hostel(RR)
content:
I have paid the fees  and submitted affidavits however they have not called me for  hostel briefing session  yet.   


Should i be worried incase i dont get a hostel alloted or should i contact the warden ?

comments.body: Have you received the date college starts? If yes they'll send you mail like one week before and u can join the hostel ig like 2 days before the college starts.
It's better if u contact the warden. U have to keep following up with them.
